function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lowered weight of illuminance","Impact":"Reduced emphasis on visual comfort and potential for glare","Mitigation":"Reevaluate weight distribution for IEQ factors","Technologies":"Advanced sensors for measuring illuminance","People":"Building occupants, designers, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Inability to measure noise level","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of acoustic comfort","Mitigation":"Addition of noise sensor to IBEM device","Technologies":"Noise sensors for IBEM device","People":"Building occupants, designers, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Weighting scheme subject to revision","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate or outdated IEQ evaluation","Mitigation":"Regular review and update of weighting scheme","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics for IEQ evaluation","People":"Building occupants, designers, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
